title.narrative: Countries enabled to strengthen data, analytics and health information systems to inform policy and deliver impacts.

description.narrative: Disease burden; health risks; determinants of health; noncommunicable diseases (cardiovascular, cancer, diabetes,chronic respiratory diseases); mental health conditions; disorders caused by alcohol, psychoactive drugs and addictive behaviours; neglected tropical diseases; life course (newborn, child, adolescent, sexual and reproductive, maternal, ageing); nutrition; health workforce; knowledge management policies; eHealth.
Strengthened country capacity in data and innovation
